amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funding to be used for the salary of the DHS Secretary, Alejandro Mayorkas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 193 - 173 (Roll no. 285).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 193 - 173 (Roll no. 285).
